price: 108. Libela kati na yango, bakolikia mbongwana te kati na yango.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
